Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits certain persons from receiving compensation for legal fees, consulting, or other work performed for an industrial development agency or an economic assistance corporation
Summary: Prohibits elected officials and persons in a leadership position of a party committee from receiving compensation for legal fees, consulting, or other work performed for an industrial development agency or an economic assistance corporation.
LawCode: Amd ยง73, Pub Off L; amd ยง2825, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting certain persons from receiving compensation for legal fees, consulting, or other work performed for an industrial development agency or an economic assistance corporation
